MWC.GUI

Interface Layer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    CanEnumerate, java.lang.Comparable<Plottable>, Editable, HasEditables, Plottable, java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbsoluteTMASegment, BaseLayer, BuoyPatternWrapper, ChartFolio, CompositeTrackWrapper, CoreTMASegment, CoverageLayer, CoverageLayer.ReferenceCoverageLayer, DynamicInfillSegment, DynamicLayer, DynamicPolygonShapeWrapper, DynamicShapeLayer, DynamicTrackShapeSetWrapper, ETOPO_2_Minute, ETOPOPainter, ExternallyManagedDataLayer, GPackage, GTrack, LibraryLayer, LightweightTrackWrapper, NarrativeWrapper, PlanningSegment, PlanningSegment.ClosingSegment, PolygonShape, PolygonWrapper, RelativeTMASegment, S57Layer, SensorWrapper, SpatialRasterPainter, SplittableLayer, TacticalDataWrapper, TMAWrapper, TrackSegment, TrackWrapper, TrackWrapper_Support.BaseItemLayer, TrackWrapper_Support.SegmentList, VPFDatabase, WorldPathDetailEditor.PathPlotter

    public interface Layer
extends java.io.Serializable, Plottable, HasEditables
    this class is a collection of objects which may be plotted to a Chart
    See Also:
    Plottables, Plottable
